content:
I feel the URL von CodeSystem-kbv-s-kbv-dmp.xml in basisprofil-de-stu3 is problematical.

see detail here: https://github.com/hl7germany/basisprofil-de-stu3/issues/187

I hope KBV staff can notice it and answer me or fix it.

Can we fix the "ValueSet-kbv-s-kbv-dmp.xml".
to "include" the right canonical url "https://fhir.kbv.de/CodeSystem/74_CS_SFHIR_KBV_DMP"

like so:
ValueSet-kbv-s-kbv-dmp.xml line 19-23

<compose>
<include>
<system value="https://fhir.kbv.de/CodeSystem/74_CS_SFHIR_KBV_DMP"/>
</include>
</compose>

Thanks for the feedback, I think we now understood the Issue ;-)

See https://github.com/hl7germany/basisprofil-de-stu3/issues/184 and https://github.com/hl7germany/basisprofil-de-stu3/issues/187 for details.
